choices: I want to squash someone's stomach!
I just want to add my own short story
1.content:
Do you want to tell the story from the perspective of the person who's stomach is being crushed/squashed?

Or would you rather tell the story from the perspective of the person who is squashing/crushing the other person's stomach?
1.title: Choose your point of view

11.content: Alright, choose who the "victim" will be below.
11.title: Squash my Stomach!

114.content:
Tami is a new graduate that somewhat didn't fit well anywhere. She was born with a special genetic make up that meant she never grew taller than 4 foot 2 despite being 20 years old now. She was truly tiny at only 63 lbs at most, making her look like a doll to someone normal size.

Tami started her battle to find her first job as a fresh graduate but it wasn't an easy task at her size, she was mostly turned down due to that as a matter of safety, or simply because nobody took her seriously. After weeks of being rejected, she decided to try the local library. She remembered they were hiring but it was already summer break so she had her reservations as to whether they still needed someone during down time.

The local library was quite old, in fact it was the first library in her small town. It was quite rustic and most of the furniture there was antique. But the place was also quite cramped she remembered. Oh well, let's try, she thought to herself.

Tami starts her journey there a few blocks away, CV in hand, dressed as professionally as she could for her size since she could barely find anything womanly that fit her. She was bound to wear school uniforms as formal wear.

Tami reaches the library door and tries to push; the old door was heavy. I can't even open a damn door, she think to herself slightly laughing at her predicament. She turns around and leans her entire back into it and uses her legs to push back, finally making the door swing open slowly. She gets in...

As she turns around, she's faced by a tall reception desk she couldn't see beyond.

"Hello..." Tami yells, trying to get the attention of whoever might be behind that desk. Nothing..
"G..Good morning..." She tries again hoping someone would respond or hear her. Nothing...

Tami decides to tippy toe against the high desk, trying to see if anyone was behind. She puts her tiny hands on the edge of the desk and raises herself as high as she could, her eyes peaking over it, all she could see was an old computer with the screensaver playing on it. ummm she thought to herself, maybe they're on a bathroom break. So Tami decides to walk around the library a bit.

As she reaches the massive old book shelves, she could see that there was no way she could reach anything beyond the 4th shelf. "There's no way they'd give me a damn job, I can't even reach the book!" She says to herself slightly frustrated. What she didn't realise is that she had said it a bit too loudly, assuming nobody was there.

"Is that so?" Says a voice from behind the shelves.

It was the librarian, a middle aged woman. Tami froze in embarrassment as she could hear the lady walking around the shelves to greet her. The wooden floor was creaking under each step as she walked slowly towards the tiny woman, taking slow deliberate steps until she was face to face, so to speak...

"Hello, little one..." The lady says looking down as she pats the little woman on her head thinking it was a child.

"ah ummm, I'm 20 years old and I'm here for the job... Ma'am.." Tami says shyly, looking down.

"Oh dear, my apologies. I assumed..." Stated the lady. "Well I may have an opening actually since the last guy had to leave on vacation.

Tami kept her head hung looking down. She was immediately greet by this woman's gigantic shoes. oh my god, the woman was huge compared to me she thought, her feet alone were easily dwarfing mine utterly.

"As you can see..." The woman states. "There isn't much to do, so you might get bored just keeping me company.Tell me, are you good with computers?"

Tami is awakened from her trance. "Umm ermm yes Ma'am, yes.. umm here's my CV.. I've just gradu..."

She was immediately cut off. "Good! I need your help with something...follow me"
114.title: Tami - 4 foot 2 - 63 pounds

choices: Tami needs the wiring under the power unit..
Another task, the computer is fixed quickly..
1141.content:
"Yes Ma'am..." Tami obliges, she expected to be given an interview but non of that happened. Is she being offered the job? She just decides to follow the woman back towards the reception desk.

As she walks behind the tall lady, she barely comes up to her large bottom as she walks slowly in front of her. The librarian was wearing a dark blue skirt, a white shirt, and some old tan flats that strained to contain her massive feet. Tami looks down as she walk closely behind her new seemingly new boss and is greeted yet again by those large shoes. The giant lady had somehow worn through the short heel that rendered her flats completely flat so to speak. Must be from her massive weight, Tami thought to herself, she's completely crushed those poor shoes.

"Oh my, it's tiring being on your feet all day..." The lady suddenly says. Tami not realising she had stopped by the desk's edge and was looking at her. Tami froze yet again, slightly embarrassed she was caught looking down again.

"My name's is Valerie, by the way... You can call me that from now on." The librarian states as she raises one foot behind her..

"oh, nice to meet you, Ma'am..ermm, i mean, Valerie..It's a beautiful name.." Tami says, catching Valerie fiddling with the back of her shoe, seemingly pulling out her bare heel out of her large shoe.

"And yours is? I presume you have a name?" Valerie asks mockingly as she grins at the little woman.

"Oh yeah, Tami! My name's is Tami, you can call me that..." She says happily.

"Well, Tami, nice to meet you..." Valerie says as she pushes the back her flat under her bare heel before stepping down. She does the same to her other shoe, essentially turning them into slip-ons or fancy leather slippers.

"Here's the problem, Tami. I have had issues with my computer for quite a while now. It seems to turn itself off while I'm in the middle of work." The librarian says as she lays down Tami's first task. "What do you think could be wrong with it?"

Tami pauses for a moment to think as she began rubbing her head... "Umm, might be a loose connection?"

"Yeah, that's a good point..." Valerie says. "Would you be able to check for me?"

"Yeah, of course. I'll need to get access to the wiring, please." Tami says as Valerie steps aside pointing directly under the desk.

"It's all yours, dear. Right under there." Tami looks up then down the tall lady leading her into the dark space under her desk as she began walking slowly towards it. Valerie tried to move out of the way but the place was so cramped Tami suddenly bumped into her hip, putting her off balance. Valerie didn't even budge, nearly knocking little Tami off her feet.

"Oups, I'm sorry, little one. Didn't see you there..." Valerie giggles. "Be careful now, you don't want to end up on the floor, where I can't see you..." She winks down at her.
"I'm ... sorry.. my bad. It's ok, I'm..fine.." Tami tries to compose herself as she quickly bends down to get under the desk in order to fix the computer, but also to escape Valerie's gaze from embarrassment.

Valerie follows Tami, taking a step towards the back of the desk where her large foot bumped into Tami's leg as she crouched down to get under the desk. This time, Valerie didn't apologise but simply left her large foot there as she leaned down slightly to see Tami crawl under there.

"Do you see it?" Valerie asks, prompting Tami to look back at her. She's promptly greeted by the librarian standing over her as the side of her leg pressed against the giant shoe.

"Yes... It's a lot of wires, Valerie..." Tami tells the tall librarian. "But given time, I think I can do it..." Tami says with a smile.

"Get to it then! This is your first task, dear..." Valerie ads "But I might have to sit at my desk too, I have some papers to organise."

"Sure, no problem." Tami says as Valerie starts to swing around to sit in her chair. Tami quickly moves out of the way as Valerie pushes her feet under the desk,cramping Tami in there even more.

"Are you alright down there?" Valerie asks as she gently nudges the tiny woman with her shoe under her desk.
"Yes, Ma'am.. umm Valerie.. Don't worry, you can rest your feet on my leg if it's more comfortable." Tami says but quickly thinks to herself, what am I saying?! And just shakes her head.

"Are you sure? It would certainly help as it's a bit tight in there, but won't that distract you from fixing my computer?" Valerie says as she raises one foot over the little woman's legs, setting it slowly on top of her.

Tami freezes instantly, feeling the huge shoe on her lap, it was massive covering her thighs completely as the weight of Valerie's leg and foot press down on her legs.

"No problem.." She simply says, admitting it was her own doing for having a loose mouth.
"Alright honey, enjoy work!" Valerie says swinging her other foot around until it reaches the tiny woman under her desk, effectively bringing it on top of her legs too. Tami's legs were being crushed under the weight of the woman's feet and legs alone as she began to fiddle with the wiring. Valerie shuffled her feet on her a few times to get comfortable while thinking to herself that this girl didn't even complain, what a little darling she is.Too precious, she whispered to herself.

Tami could feel Valerie was getting uncomfortable as her feet were fidgeting quite a bit, pressing and twisting on top of her little legs. This went on for quite a while before she finally moved her right leg and swung it behind the little woman, stepping squarely behind her as her instep pressed against Tami's bum. she was somewhat sandwiched between Valerie's calves as her left foot remained on top of her thighs, pressing quite a bit of weight on her.

"How are we doing down there, my little footstool?" She says jokingly, making Tami giggle.
"I'm getting there, it just takes a little time to reconnect all the wir.." Tami tries to explain but is interrupted by her boss, Valerie.

"No darling, I meant I hope I'm not squashing you too much under my feet?" Valerie smiles down pressing her foot down a little harder this time as she brings her legs together, pressing the little women between her calves to get a reaction from her. Tami, as if by reflex, immediately hugs the woman's leg as her own legs were being squashed underneath the librarian's heavy shoe, making Valerie giggle slightly.

"I guess you're fine with this..." She says jokingly, getting back to work on her papers. Tami still pressed between the woman's legs, also gets back to work.

Valerie moved a lot during this, shifting her legs and pressing down on tami's legs here and there. Eventually, Tami finished her task.

"umm, ehem ehem, I think it worked, would you mind turning it on please, Valerie?" Tami asks as Valerie pears down.

"Oh wonderful, let's try!" Valerie responds with a little nudge on Tami's lower stomach using the tip of her shoe making Tami jump slightly as she's caught by surprise.

Valerie fiddles with the buttons and presses a few times, nothing, the computer was dead. Not even the monitor came on. She leans forward, pressing almost half her weight on Tami's thighs as she reaches for the back of the monitor to check the connection there. Tami's legs were crushed under the woman's weight as she grunts under her foot.

"UMMM" Tami moans.

"Oh I'm sorry, forgot you were there... but my computer isn't coming on, I was just trying something... but nothing works honey."

"Oh I see.." Tami says between moans as Valerie presses down again for some reason. "I think I'll try the other side then, maybe something came off at the power unit?" Tami asks Valerie.

"Sure thing honey, what do you need?" The tall librarian asks Tami as she relieved the pressure on her legs simply resting her foot there.

"I'll need to get under the power unit on the right, umm.. let's see...how am I..."
1141.title: Tami's first task

choices: Tami wants to feel more weight...
She hasn't fixed the computer and is punished...
11411.content:
"I've got an idea!" Valerie states as she moves her legs away from behind Tami. "You could simply get down on your back and slide under there?"

Tami looks behind her innocently and realises she didn't actually need to slide back any further. She just needed to lie down on her back and swing her head under the unit to see it. "I'll just lie down, Ma'am... But it might take a bit more time, I think..."

Valerie agrees promptly as she nods her head. Tami puts her arms behind her using her little hands to lower herself on the ground. She starts to lower herself until her head bumps into the power unit's side panel, making a loud bang making Valerie laugh out loud for a second.

"OUCH!" Tami yells as Valerie giggles. "Are you alright? That must've hurt!"
"I'm fine, I'm ok!" Tami says as she rubs the back of her head. She gets around the unit's box and swings her head under it, now lying completely flat on the ground under the desk.

"Ummm, there's a problem..." Valerie ponders loudly. "Where am I supposed to put my other foot now?" She asks Tami who's already lying down.

Tami looks up just in time to see her giantess of a boss raising her right foot over her, simply letting it hover over her body as if waiting for an answer. She's greeted by the vast sole of the woman's shoe as it dangled over her body, her little legs still pressed tightly beneath her other shoe. What difference would it make, Tami thought to herself, Valerie is already stepping on me, my legs, she corrected her thoughts.

"Make yourself comfortable, boss. I'm going to be here for a while I think..." Tami quietly says.

"Comfortable?" Valerie speaks. "Then I might have to remove these!" She states as she shakes her shoe over the little girl's chest. The librarian dangles her shoe until it was hanging by her large toes, slowly displaying her large sole to the woman at her feet.

"I hope you enjoy yourself as my footrest while you fix my computer, little one.." She says with a smile as she let her shoe fall on her. "MInd moving that shoe aside so I can step on you while you work?" Valerie says in an almost stern but playful tone, teasing the girl. Tami quickly takes the massive shoe in her tiny hands, further realising just how big her boss' feet are. She takes this chance to examine the larger than life shoe turning it over to pear inside for some strange reason. She looks inside for a solid few seconds, being caught in the moment, she's amazed and shocked at how the outline of her sole was baked into the shoe's insole, darkened by being walked on for years probably, she thought to herself.

"Ehem ehem..." Valerie gets Tami's attention. "Are you done playing with my shoe?" She smirks down playfully. Tami quickly obliges and tosses the shoe to the side. She looks back up and sees Valerie looking down at her while her bare foot was now inches away from her little chest.

"Alright honey, let me know how this feels..." Valerie began lowering her foot on top of the little woman, slowly, and gently...
Tami looks on as the gigantic sole of the middle aged woman comes closer towards her little chest, her vast wide sole pale and wrinkly as it came down on top of her, pressing gently with some weight. She was soft, in fact her little chest gave easily with a mere fraction of the older woman's leg resting on her.

"Oh my, you sure make a nice foot cushion... You're so squishy" Valerie speaks down at Tami as she presses down with more weight, flattening the girl's chest beneath her large sole.

Tami simply moans as she squashed under her foot, trying to focus on the work. "Ummmm" She moans "I'm glad you're comfortable, Valerie, but I might need to raise my legs a bit for leverage." Tami asks as she needed to raise her head from time to time to see under the power unit.

"Oh sure thing honey." Valerie promptly raises her left foot off her legs and kicks her other shoe off, making it land on Tami stomach as if by design. "Ouff!" Tami is caught off guard as her boss' shoe lands on her tummy sole first. She feels the cold and smooth plastic sole as it rests on her tummy for a few seconds. Valerie's other foot moving and shifting on top of her little chest, pressing and squashing her as Valerie moved her legs around.

"I'm sorry, let me get that!" Valerie states as she lowers her foot directly into her shoe, slowly sliding her large foot into it as it rested on Tami's stomach. She twists and presses down to "wear her shoe", crushing the little woman's tummy under her foot in order to move it away from her. Tami felt that and moaned and grunted as her chest and tummy were being crushed under the heavy woman. Valerie simply slides her foot across Tami's stomach and towards her as she pulls her shoe with her, letting it rest on the floor by Tami's tummy. She then slides her foot out of her shoe, slowly exposing her massive sole as she raises it once more over the girl entire stomach.

Valerie lets her large sole hover over Tami for a few seconds then starts its imminent decent. She quickly steps down on her, letting the sheer weight of her leg squash her belly under her sole. Tami is trapped. Her little soft tummy easily gives under the much larger woman's vast sole and first nicely under the arch of her wide foot. Tami moans quietly to the large woman's pleasure as she is now using her as a footrest for her mature soft feet.

Valerie gets to work while Tami is being squashed underneath her feet, being mushed under of the softness of her boss' massive soles. Valerie would occasionally shift her weight from one foot to the other, crushing the girl's insides in the process. She especially enjoyed the feeling of the little woman's stomach as she pressed her foot down on top of it, flattening her tummy to a mere few inches before letting up to crush her chest in turn. Slowly and gently, the giantess would slide her sole downwards, towards Tami's stomach. Valerie wanted to give Tami's tummy her full attention, it was after all so squishy and soft, it felt good, it felt right, it was the thing to do, thought Valerie.

Tami looks on, now completely consumed by what was going on. She feels and sees her boss' foot move down a couple of inches, now resting on her lower ribs and upper stomach before she felt the pressing weight crush her again, making her head raise from the ground and Valerie started grinding down on her stomach with both feet, pressing down and kneading her soft flesh like dough. Tami's legs raise up too as tummy compressed under the woman's crushing soles.

"Enjoying this, aren't we?" Valerie smiles while pressing her soles into the little woman's belly. "You like being squished, like the little bug you are..." She teases the girl lying under her feet.

Tami wasn't even working any more, she simply lay under her boss' soles as she crushed her relentlessly. She didn't know why, but Valerie was right, she was actually enjoying it. She was falling in love with the idea of being squashed under this woman's massive soles, she was feeling her insides somehow move under the crushing weight as Valerie's soles had her way with her tummy, crushing it flat with every passing moment. She continued to moan with every step, every time Valerie pressed down with one foot, Tami would respond with a moan and her body would jerk, up and down, with every step...but she loved it despite the pain and the sheer crushing weight of Valerie's legs.

"You seem quite resilient, your body is stronger than I thought... I didn't think you'd even let me rest my feet on you, and yet here you are..." The giantess of a librarian started saying to Tami. "Would you maybe consider... letting me stand on top of you?"

Tami froze yet again, and simply went limp on the floor at the thought of that. Her boss, Valerie, who probably weighed at least 5 time more than her, to step on her, with her full weight? The idea sent chills down her back, from both being scared and excited at the thought of it. She would crush her, like she said, like a bug. Tami would lie down at her boss' feet only for her to step down on her, crushing her flat on the floor underneath her vast unforgiving soles.

Tami... Tami...
11411.title: Tami needs the wiring under the power unit..

choices: "... know what being crushed really feels like..."
114112.content:
"I'm...I'm a little scared,Valerie... I mean...I'm very small and you could easily crush me..." Tami says shyly as Valerie paused for a moment, letting both feet rest on top of her tummy.
"Well..." She starts to say thoughtfully. "You seem to enjoy your belly pressed under my feet, what difference would it make if I were to stand on it?" She asks mockingly as she pressed one sole into Tami's flesh, flattening her guts under her sole in an instant. Tami lets out a loud sound as her insides are squashed under the bigger woman's foot.

"Honey, just think of it as a heavy massage... It'll feel great I'm sure..." She adds with a smile as she begins lifting her feet off the smaller woman. "All right, dear... why don't you follow me? Let's go to the back..." Valerie says as she starts pushing back to get up from her chair. Tami looks up and starts to get up herself, trying not to bump into her boss as she stands to her feet.

Valerie turns around and starts to walk towards the back of the library as Tami begins to follow her. Valerie now barefoot, was taking slow deliberate steps raising her soles slightly behind her, teasing the little woman she knew was close behind her. Tami indeed kept staring down as she walked a few steps behind her boss, mesmerized by the sight of her boss' large soles as they gathered dirt and dust as she stepped on the carpeted floor beneath her. She almost wanted to be that floor, to be walked on, stood on, and crushed underneath the soles of her massive boss as she looked down at her.

Tami quickly wakes up from her trance as Valerie suddenly stops walking, indicating that they have reached the right place. The tall woman looks down at Tami before she starts raising one foot behind her, displaying her large now dirty sole to her.
"Oh my, I forgot to wear my shoes and now my soles are all dirty... Why don't you be a dear and lie down for me, I need to wipe my feet on something." Valerie says with a sly smirk on her beautiful face.

Tami without hesitation starts to lie down on her back, right between the wall and her tall boss. Valerie reaches across and puts her hands against the wall, raising one foot slightly before moving forwards quickly, hovering her large sole over the little woman's chest. From this angle, Tami looks up to see what looks like a giantess about to step down on her. Her breaths become shallow and she has a worried look on her face as she stares right into her boss' vast meaty sole just hovering there about to come down on top of her little body.

"Umm, Madam, I mean.. Valerie.. please please be gentle, don't squish me under your feet..." She pleads, genuinely scared for her life or at least fearing getting injured under the crushing weight.
"Don't be scared, dear. I tell you what, let me test you first, see how much you can take. Deal?" Valerie looks down with caring eyes as starts to lower her foot down on top of Tami's chest. "Here we go..." Valerie says and starts applying more weight, slowly flattening the little woman under her sole as she lets her weight come down on her. Tami moans and grunts as she starts feeling her ribs flatten under the massive sole. She panics for a second and starts to let out a word... "Wai.." But it was too late, Valerie quickly cuts her short as she steps up on her with her full weight, instantly squashing the air out of her lungs. Tami's eyes go watery as she bares her boss' entire weight. She looks down at her chest and sees nothing but a large foot crushing her flat before she looks to her right seeing another foot about to join it on top of her. She tries to speak but nothing comes out, not even a moan.

Valerie brings her right foot on top of the woman, now standing on her with both feet firmly pressed on her chest, squashing her flat on under her feet. She can feel the smaller woman's body flatten slowly under her as she stands still for a handful of seconds, what felt like an eternity to Tami. Valerie quickly steps down, it was only a test as she had said.

"And how did we feel down there? Have I crushed you flat yet or shall I try your little tummy? There's still some dirt under my feet..." Valerie says smiling down at the little woman on the floor.

Tami trying to recover from the ordeal, she manages to get her breath back. "Oh my... what... that was heavy... I thought I was a goner..." She giggles slightly as she catches her breath. "I'm... I think I can try.. yeah.." Tami says as Valerie gives her a nod acknowledging her bravery. "Alright my little darling, let's try for a little longer this time, ok? Don't be scared, I'll know when to get off you. Just... enjoy yourself under there." She winks down as she steps sideways, now facing the little woman's tummy. Valerie begins raising her foot yet again, this time her right foot as she brings it forwards and over Tami's lower belly for a few seconds before lowering it on top of her.

Tami almost by instinct, brings her little hands down, holding onto her boss' bare foot. One hand wrapped itself around her bare heel while the other one pressed against the top of her large foot as if to push it off. Valerie was too strong however and her foot simply came down until it touched and then pressed down against her belly. Tami grunts and yet not even half the woman's weight was on her yet. Valerie looks down and makes fun of her. "What? I haven't even started yet..." She laughs teasingly. "Alright, round two!" She says as she begins to step down on her captive, slowly but surely squashing her belly flat under her unforgiving sole.

Tami's hands leave the larger than life foot as she tries to push herself from under there, pressing her little hands on the carpet. She manages to catch Valerie's other foot as she lifts her toes up just in time for Tami's hand to slide underneath her foot before it came back down, trapping her little hand under her soft sole. Tami moans as she tries to pull her hand out but Valerie simply steps down on it with her entire weight, pressing it flat into the carpet. Meanwhile her other foot was crushing her guts flat as half her weight was now on her, relieving some weight from her hand.

"And ... squish.." Valerie says before stepping down with her full weight, now raising her other foot off her hand and curling her leg behind her, showing Tami she was completely on top of her. Tami felt it as she lets out a loud grunt, prompting the larger woman to bring her other foot down, now stepping on top of her entire tummy with both feet side by side. She doubles up instantly but her stomach muscles give up quickly, send her on her back as Valerie stands still feeling her intestines somehow shift inside her.

Her stomach gives in more and more with every passing second and since Valerie wasn't standing on her chest anymore, Tami was able to breathe a little better than before. But she could certainly feel the soles crushing the life out of her slowly as she lay beneath them. She could feel the heavy woman's soles as they pressed deep into her tummy, in fact they completely flattened her tummy under their vastness as she was covered completely from her upper stomach to her midsection underneath her boss' fleshy soles.

Looking down, Valerie catches a glimpse of her employee's face as she smiles at her, content with how well she was doing under her. She looks back at her tummy only to see her feet completely covered her. Valerie teases the already squashed girl by bouncing slightly on top of her squashed belly a couple of times, squishing a couple of moans from her. Tami's stomach was as flat as it could possibly get now as her legs began to tingle going slightly numb. As if she knew, Valerie begins to raise her left foot, getting ready to step down, or so Tami thought...

Instead, Tami was greeted by a massive sole approaching her chest as Valerie moved her foot sideways towards the girl's upper chest yet again. "This should give your teeny tummy a little break..." She says as she steps down heavily on top of her chest, squashing it instantly under her full weight, letting her stomach inflate back to its normal shape. Tami brings her hands around the giantess' ankle as she feels nothing but the crushing weight squishing her lungs flat. She tries to fight it to no avail. Valerie's foot slides slight almost touching the girl's throat as Tami felt the side of her sole touch it slightly. She's quickly saved from having her windpipe crushed as Valerie steps forward with her other foot, pressing her entire chest flat beneath her soles.

"Oups! Imagine how that would've ended!" Valerie rearranges her sole on top of her upper chest. "I would have crushed your little throat under my foot!" She giggles slowly lifting her sole over the little woman's throat and face. "...like a little twig.." She says jokingly before quickly stepping down and softly caressing the vulnerable woman's throat with her vast heavy sole. Tami froze, both from absolute fear and also because she felt her boss' bare sole touching her face slightly for the first time. Just as she turns her face to the side, Valerie lets her sole rest gently on top of her neck and face, catching her ear and cheek under her foot as her soft bare heel rested on her neck.

"I think my feet are clean enough for the next...step now. What do you think, my little Tami?" Valerie asks before slowly raising her foot just enough for Tami to catch a glimpse of her massive sole.

Unable to speak as her chest was being crushed under her other foot, Tami simply nods quickly as she stares into the large sole hovering over her now upturned face.

"Alright, good... but your shirt sure is the one that's dirty now... You have my footprints all over you!" Valerie says slowly lowering her foot back on top of Tami's face before sliding it back onto her little chest again wiping her entire sole on her face.

"Time for you to......"
114112.title: Tami is worried...

choices: She makes her way down slowly...
1141121.content:
"Alright, good... but your shirt sure is the one that's dirty now... You have my footprints all over you!" Valerie says slowly lowering her foot back on top of Tami's face before sliding it back onto her little chest again wiping her entire sole on her face.

"Time for you to take off your dirty shirt!" Valerie says looking down as she stood firmly on top of the smaller woman's chest for a few more seconds before stepping down onto the carpet next to her. Tami completely out of breath starts trying to recover from the squashing she'd just received.

"Breathe honey, breathe..." Valerie tells her as she steps forwards and towards Tami's head. "Come on now, we haven't got all day, take that shirt off...!" Valerie orders Tami, tapping her foot impatiently next to Tami's head. Tami starts to get up to unbutton her shirt but her boss had another idea.

"Why don't you lie back down and do it without looking! Let's see if you can manage that!" Valerie says playfully. "And to make sure you don't peak..." Valerie suddenly lifts her left foot up and pins Tami's head underneath it, pressing her face to the side between her vast sole and the carpet. All Tami could now see was her giantess boss' bare heel as it hung over the side of her face squished under her heavy sole.

Tami began by pulling her shirt from under her skirt before starting to unbutton it from the bottom up. She struggles a couple of times but manages to reach her collar after a few seconds; that one last button was hard.
"You might want to speed up before I decide to step down on your little head and crush it like a grape!" She teases while pressing down with some weight, feeling little Tami's face mold to her fleshy sole. Bored, Valerie starts rolling little Tami's head under her sole, from one side to the other side of her face, Valerie presses Tami's face firmly with her sole as she slides her sole back and forth rubbing the smaller woman's face under her foot like some kind of massager.
This of course didn't make things easier as Tami struggled even more to get that last button under her collar. "I think somebody wants to get their little head stepped on by me..." Valerie teases further as she stops moving her foot and simply rested her sole across Tami's upturned face.

Truth is, Tami wanted her to do just that. She wanted her much bigger boss to step down with her entire weight, squash her face, walk on her, squash her body with her beautiful bare feet. She wanted her to stand on her stomach the most, squash it flat until she couldn't handle it and then some more. And now that she was taking off her shirt, she wanted to feel Valerie's large soles pressing against her bare tummy, flattening it under the softness as she stood on her with her full womanly weight. No, she craved it with every fiber of her little body. She even began feeling butterflies in her stomach just at the thought of it. Butterflies that were soon going to get squished under the giantess of a boss she had.

"UMMMM" Tami's muffled voice says into the soft sole as she finally managed to unbutton the last one. She quickly pulls her arms out of the sleeves and lets her shirt lay on the floor. Valerie gives her face a couple of twists with her foot before stepping back down on the carpet. "WELL DONE! You did it, little one... ummm, and that tummy of yours sure looks tasty..." She licks her lips, anticipating what's to come.
1141121.title: "...take off your dirty shirt!"

choices: Valerie wants to try with shoes on...
Valerie's sister knocks on the door...
11411212.content:
Valerie's stands besides her little assistant's body as it lay on the carpet before her, she looks down to admire her skinny little body as she now took off her shirt, laying at her boss' feet in nothing but her skirt and bra. Valerie takes one small step sideways now standing in front of Tami's little chest.

"You're pretty strong for a skinny one, I'm surprised I haven't caused any damage....yet." Valerie teases as she sees Tami's eyes bulge out, surely when she said the word "yet". Valerie was only teasing of course, she didn't want to hurt her too much or cause permanent damage, she only wanted her to feel crushed and powerless under her as she walked all over her puny body, asserting power over her.

Tami looks up her towering boss' body as she stood over her completely dominating her view; her long powerful legs shooting up like trees before her, her shirt tied in a knot exposing Valerie's tummy under her massive breasts struggling in her buttoned white shirt. Way up over her, she greeted by Valerie's face as she smiled down at her with her hands on her wide hips. Valerie tilts her head to the side as she starts to raise her left foot over the young woman's upper body, hovering it over her teasingly, this time without saying a word. Slowly and gently, her sole comes down onto Tami's upper chest as it caresses her now bare body.

Tami shivers, as she feels her boss' sole touch her bare upper chest for the first time. It felt warm and soft, as Valerie began slowly sliding her sole left and right, pressing down occasionally, teasing the smaller woman with her weight. She catches her throat, again, but this time she actually presses down on it until Tami groans from the weight crushing her windpipe. Valerie doesn't stop, prompting Tami to bring her little hands on either side of her large foot. Tami brings her right hand and tries to push up against Valerie's big bare heel as her little throat fit perfectly under her large soft arch. Her other hand pushing against the large toes and ball of her foot. Valerie is intrigued and presses down even more, making Tami's lower body raise from the floor as she tries to push her foot away from her throat. In on last act, Valerie starts tilting her foot forward, bringing her toes to the ground with Tami's little hand still underneath them. Her foot was so big that Tami's throat was still firmly presses under her sole while her toes were now on the carpet, crushing the little hand under them.

"Pick one..." Valerie orders teasingly as she began pressing down on both her throat and hand. Tami promptly responds with trying to wiggle her fingers under her boss's foot.

"Wise choice..." Valerie begins to step down on the little hand but inevitably slightly crushing Tami's throat still stuck under the meaty arch of her foot. Tami's eyes began to water as her throat is being crushed under her much larger female boss while her upturned hand was now carrying Valerie's entire weight. From this angle, Tami could now see the back of Valerie thick leg as it stood over her. Her strong calf, her large meaty thigh, and part of her big bottom were visible under her formal skirt. If it weren't for the crushing weight pressing down on her throat and hand she'd actually enjoy the view thought Tami.

"It feels like wearing a high heel.." Giggle Valerie as she bounces her bare feel slightly on top of Tami's throat, thankfully the blunt of her weight was on her hand, thought Tami as she coughed and grunt under there.

Tami suddenly felt movement, it was Valerie's other foot! She started raising her right foot quickly bringing it on top of her chest. The vast sole found its place on top of her little chest, squashing her lungs flat in one slow oppressing motion. "UMMMM" moans Tami as her boss brings her entire weight on that foot slowly raising her left sole off her throat and hand. She looks up to see it right over her face just in time as it began coming down. Tami didn't have time to react as she quickly got smothered in her boss' big meaty sole as it pressed down on her face. There was no fight left in her so she didn't even try to push it off, all she could do was endure as Valerie fully stood on her chest and face.

The giantess of a boss suddenly started shifting her weight from her right foot to the left, completely obliterating her little assistant's face underneath her sole. Unable to breathe or let alone talk, all Tami could do was moan, a moan muffled by foot flesh. Just as her face was turning all shades of red and purple, Valerie lifts her foot off her face and steps down heavily on her chest.

Now with both feet firmly planted on the little woman's chest, Valerie starts to walk in place without saying a word. Every step squashing a faint moan out of Tami as she sees and feels her boss' large soles crushing her, over and over for a few long minutes. Valerie made sure she flattened every part of the smaller woman's chest stepping all over her.

Again, without uttering a word, Valerie starts to step sideways, letting her right sole rest heavily on the little woman's lower belly, squashing it flat instantly with her full weight. She brings her other foot down and steps on top of her stomach, now rendering her entire tummy completely flat underneath her vast meaty soles. She looks down, possibly to make sure Tami can actually breathe now, or maybe to see her expression of pain as she grunts while her insides feel like they're shifting around underneath her heavy boss' feet as she stood still for what felt like forever. She also feels the bare soles as they presses tightly against her bare tummy for the first time, a sensation that died in her heart as she tried to enjoy it as much as she could. She somehow felt security and sensually aroused as her giantess of a boss stood on her bare tummy, crushing it flatter with every passing second. The warmth, the weight, her belly molding to the curves of her soles, it was all too much to take in as she lay flat on the floor and at the mercy of her beautiful boss...

"Sss..squish mee..." Tami manages to let out. "Stand on me..forever..".

"oh darling, isn't that quite the request for someone being squished already under my feet..." She looks down playfully. "Or maybe you want to try something...more?" Valerie teases...
11411212.title: She makes her way down slowly...

choices: Valerie decides to put her shoes back on...
114113.content:
"I'm not sure I could take it, Ma'am.." Tami reluctantly says.

"Well, little one, first things first. Have you fixed my computer yet?" Valerie knowingly inquires.

Tami was caught, she wasn't doing anything, she simply lied down under her boss' feet while doing nothing. Not even a single wire was checked under the power unit. Tami was done.

"Umm..ermm. I.... I..." Tami was now stammering, unable to form a single phrase. "I didn't... You... your feet..." Tami bubbled on...

Valerie peaks down with her utmost serious face. "What? Are you telling me I'm paying you for nothing? You did... nothing?" She asks menacingly while pressing hard into the girl's stomach with her feet.

"GET UP! Get out of there and come with me, NOW!" Valerie orders the little woman as she kicks her in the side with one foot, prompting her to get up. Valerie stands up between the chair and the desk and stands there, waiting for Tami to slide out from under the desk as she does. Just as she pears from under the wodden frame, Valerie catches her with her foot, raising her right foot over her chest and lowering it quickly, pressing down with some weight.

Tami looked up in horror as the very tall woman stood over her, stepping with one foot on top of her chest making it hard to breathe.
"I could literally crush you right now! You're useless! Like a little cockroach, the only thing to do to bug is... crush!" Valerie says while looking down, pressing down even more, squashing the little woman's chest flat under half her weight. She began twisting her sole all over her little crushed chest, as if to finish her off effectively. "You're nothing but a little bug under my foot, you understand that?? You useless little girl! Aghhh I could squish you right NOW!" She says angrily.

Valerie leans forward and picks up a small remote on the desk, pressing a button, it locks the front door and closes the blinds.
"Now you have all of my attention, little bug!" Valerie sternly says as she presses half her entire weight onto the tiny woman's little chest. But to her utmost shock and surprise, Tami, despite being scared, wanted more, much more... However, not wanting to anger her boss, she simply kept apologising as she was pinned beneath her large foot.

"I'm so sorry, I'll fix it, just give me... UMMMM" She moans as Valerie presses down harder. "Just... give ... me.. a chance.. please..please don't squish me.." Valerie was not impressed, "I GAVE YOU a chance! Now here's your chance to get squashed like a bug under my feet!" Valerie says angrily as she slid her gigantic sole down the girl's body until she was stepping on top of her belly. Her bare foot was big, and wide. It was certainly fleshy but not fat, Tami thought as it sat on her belly, preparing to crush her.

Valerie looks down one more time, and without a word, she began to step on her new employee, Tami's soft belly easily giving under the overwhelming weight of her giantess boss. She tries to breathe quickly and only manages shallow breaths, the air being squashed out of her every time Valerie came down with more weight. Soon Tami could no longer breathe much as her belly compressed beyond what she thought was possible as her captor's sole came down on top of her. Tami's legs shot up as does her chest just in time Valerie started raising her other foot behind her, letting her massive weight crush the girl in half underneath one foot.

"THIS... This is what you deserve! And I hope I'm completely crushing you underneath my foot! You useless cockroach..." She whispers at the end as she slowly swings her other foot around, bringing it on top of her belly too.

Now standing on her stomach with both feet firmly planted on her bug assistant, she stands in place for a few long seconds, letting her full weight press the girl's stomach as flat as it can go, feeling her guts and other insides shift and squash under her vast meaty soles. 30 seconds... Valerie began a slow twisting, starting at her hips, moving her legs clockwise and then back, making her soles twist around on the already flattened girl's stomach, squashing it even more. Tami moans quietly, being unable to speak or breath much, let alone yell. She simply moans as her boss has her way with her, completely squashing her under her large dominating feet.

1 minute... Valerie begins to take low and slow steps on top of her, squashing whatever resolve was left in her, and flattening her guts to an unbelievable 2 inches in width. Valerie felt something touch her soft soles, it was effectively Tami's spine and hip bones as her flesh completely gave underneath the full crushing weight of Valerie's curvy womanly body as she methodically and rhythmically walked on her tummy.

Soon enough, Tami was beginning to succumb to fatigue as her body began to fall back, no longer able to double up under the relentless steps of Valerie. She simply lay limp on the ground as her tummy now felt like a jelly cushion under Valerie's heavy soles. Valerie crushed both her body and spirit, but somehow, through all this, Tami had a tiny bit of joy out of this, she actually didn't want Valerie to stop stepping on her even though she was literally crushing her alive.

Moan she does as is all she could do under her boss' punishing soles.

"I'm glad you seem to enjoy it honey... You don't seem to be complaining much.." She says teasing the squashed girl beneath her feet. She stands still again, focusing all her weight on the girl's already crushed stomach, letting her vast soles flatten her up a bit for a few seconds. Tami feels Valerie simply stand there, she's unable to look down since she was too tired to raise her head and look, so she simply lay there feeling the crushing weight and warmth of her boss' soles as she stood on top of her.

"I think I'll give you a little break..." Valerie speaks as she began sliding her sole towards Tami's chest, letting it rest right in the middle of her chest facing her. She then presses down, to even out the weight, giving her belly some kind of relief. Tami sighs loudly, which sounded like a deflating balloon as Valerie pressed some air out of her lungs. Valerie's large soles covered her entire chest as her bare heel rested on top of her upper stomach white the rest of her sole lay on top of the girl's little chest, toes touching her throat.

"You're so squishy and soft, it's incredible..." Valerie says and she starts a slow and gentle shifting of her massive weight from one foot to the other, squashing the little woman's tummy then chest rhythmically. To Valerie, it felt like stepping on a bony pillow, except for the occasional moaning and grunting, it was just as soft. She couldn't believe how resilient the little woman's body was, holding her entire weight as she squashed her, walked and stood on top of it. She also enjoyed the helplessness of her victim as she crushed her on the floor, unable to move or run away. But she also found the lack of complaint from her intriguing; was she really enjoying this? Did she willingly lie down under my feet so I could step on her? Valerie thought to herself. Doesn't matter, she's a useless bug that needs to be squashed, and that's that! Valerie said to herself.

It has now been almost one hour since Tami's body was being squashed under the soles of her giantess boss with only the occasional and partial breaks of Valerie shifting her weight between her stomach and chest, allowing her to breathe from time to time.

It was time to up the game, Valerie thought...
114113.title: She hasn't fixed the computer and is punish...

choices: Rest of a day as a rug
Rest of a day as a sit pillow
1141131.content:
Valerie decided it was time to raise the bar and said to Tami: "Take my shoes and put them on your chest, with your fingers towards your face."
Tami was scared, but under the weight of Valerie she couldn't say anything and wanted it to end. She put Valerie's shoes on her chest. She thought that Valerie would leave her in a moment, he would take her shoes in his hand, put them on and it would be the end of this situation, which she did not know how to interpret.
The surprise on Tami's face and terror were enormous when she felt Valerie using her as the floor and put her foot in the shoe on her chest. The pressure grew stronger until Valerie began to put on the heel. Then the pressure was enormous, the low heel of the shoes mercilessly dug into the lower chest of Tami. Out of pain and lack of air, Tami couldn't make a sound. When Valerie put her whole foot in the shoe, she shifted all her weight to that leg, crushing Tami even more.
Then she began to put on a second shoe in the same way. Tami was in great pain, at the same time she couldn't make a sound from her mouth.
After a moment, Valerie stood with all her weight on Tami's chest in her boots, crushing her mercilessly. She looked directly into Tami's eyes and asked with a smile:
"Do you still want to work here? I would like to warn you that this will be part of your duties and you will spend a lot of time under me."
Tami was shocked. On one hand, she urgently needed this job, on the other, the prospect of being trampled, crushed - she scared her.
"Make up your mind quickly."
The only thing Tami did was nod, yes.
1141131.title: Valerie decides to put her shoes back on...

12.content: Choose the person who will be crushing the "victim's" stomach.
12.title: I want to squash someone's stomach!

13.content: Telling both perspectives is great. So why not get creative with your character choice. Choose which preset you want to start with then go from there.
13.title: Why not both?

info.brief_description: Stories centering around squashing stomachs. Can also include other forms of squashing.
info.description:
Write any stories you have that involve squashing/crushing someone's stomach or having your stomach squashed/crushed.

Most scenarios are accepted. Try not to kill off any characters immediately, if anything try and have at least a couple of chapters of "punishment".

Don't know what stomach squashing entails? Here are a few ideas (feel free to add your own too)

- Sitting on the person's stomach
- Trampling a person's stomach
- Punching the person's stomach
- Placing heavy objects on the person's stomach

(Add your ideas too)

All stories can have different aspects of squashing, crushing, trampling different parts of the body but try and include the stomach in every chapter as there are plenty of stories out there for other parts of the body.
